message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you.  Given its features and value, I'm offering it at $22,000.  What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I believe we can find a more mutually beneficial price. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price.  While that's a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $18,000. I believe this reflects a fair price considering the value this product will bring you.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $16,000 for the product. I believe this offers a good balance between the value of the product and my financial situation.
